website_summaries.verdict: When paired with included mini balls, thin diameter bat barrel can help players hone their hand/eye coordination.
pros: Lightweight training bat and has 30" in length, so players can use it repeatedly without becoming tired
Only 1-1/8" in diameter, so it forces players to be precise with their swing plane to make solid contact
Ships with three mini balls to help with practice time
cons: Not made to hit actual baseballs
Included plastic balls won't stand up to repeated use

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for ball tracking and hand eye coordination
customer_reviews.text: I got this bat for my son to get his tracking of the ball and hand-eye coordination better. I also bought him small wiffle and foam golf balls to really up the challenge. It really improved his tracking of the ball and he has a lot easier time to hit the ball now since the baseball is so much bigger than these balls. Like any bat, the kids get a response on the flight of the ball knowing if they made good contact or not. Highly recommend on this bat for baseball or softball players that want to track the ball better.
customer_reviews.author: Big T

customer_reviews.title: I would add the little foam yellow balls like I did
customer_reviews.text: I coach an 8u baseball team, and this has helped my kids hit the ball square on. I would add the little foam yellow balls like I did, the 2 wiffle balls are useless. you can actually pitch or soft toss those. well worth the money though. This, plus a dozen of the yellow mini balls is still well under what you pay for a slim bat the big sport stores
customer_reviews.author: steven fisher

customer_reviews.title: Skinny bat, fat results.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly believe this has helped my 7 year old's batting. He has not struck out since we started using this training aid. I pitch him a couple dozen of these golf balls in the backyard before his games. The golf balls give good feed back without traveling too far. His biggest issue now is laying off pitches, he swings at everything, but thanks to this he hits even the bad pitches.
customer_reviews.author: Customer X

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 9-10 year old baseball team
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool. We started using it right before our 9-10 year old playoffs and it really helped several kids. The weight is comparable to a regular bat for an 8-10 year old but once you go above 10 it may be too light. Which isn't an issue necessarily as the goal is hand eye coordination BUT think it really fits perfectly for 8-10 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Ibburnk18cnu

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We just tried it today. My son likes it and I think this will only improve his coordination skills for baseball. It appears to be well made and should be able to endure an 11 year old boys practice.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Great for training !
customer_reviews.text: My kids all love and use this everyday. The real thing. Seams like it will never break. And the first time my granddaughter killed it when she was using a full normal bat. Great training tool!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old son was having difficulty making contact with standard bat and ball. We began using this for practice to develop better coordination and it has worked well. This week he managed to get his first good hit off a player pitcher! Great tool and value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 7 year....wish I would have bought something a little heavier. Closer to his bat weight in games. But overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Coley H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Balls were a little to light for the purpose is the only con.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small scrape on the front end but not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as advertised. The thin bat with golf ball sized balls is a great hitting training aid. We have used it for side toss, toss from behind, dual ball side toss and even just normal underhand toss. We did buy some extra balls because the three balls that come with the bat are not really enough if you don't want to spend all your time chasing them down.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nemeth

customer_reviews.title: Team used once and kids seemed to like it. Not sure it will hold up for ...
customer_reviews.text: Team used once and kids seemed to like it. Not sure it will hold up for the entire season.
customer_reviews.author: tjo0326

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great training bat, but for older kids. I would say probably 9 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Slickfuzz

customer_reviews.title: This is great for my son's batting practice in the backyard
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my son's batting practice in the backyard. I also bought a larger bag of balls to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom21

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Aid
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I also picked up a pack of the Sklz balls as the ones that came with the bat are a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Cbax9

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat
customer_reviews.text: This bat is great to use for hand and eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product i ordered this with small small balls and has improved hitting very much
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Newman

customer_reviews.title: The ones supplied crack and break pretty
customer_reviews.text: Plan to buy extra balls. The ones supplied crack and break pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: R S G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband coaches little league and love using this for practices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the Pro Elite Trainer
customer_reviews.text: So helpful in batting practice!! It helps improve your batting performance and overall ability to make contact with the ball!
customer_reviews.author: samantha haney

customer_reviews.title: Frankling Swing Trainer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item to use in our hitting drills for the Texas Heat '03 Select Softball team. It has done a great job having the girls focus on ball contact. We use the plastic golf balls which really work best. Coach Chris
customer_reviews.author: The Browns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product, son has been using it before his games
customer_reviews.author: that guy69

customer_reviews.title: Bat is ok but the plastic balls you could have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bat is ok but the Plastic Balls you could have kept them, they busted after one hit. Had to buy rawlings 5 inch tape balls. I checked back and the item should have came with the soft balls and not the plastic balls.
customer_reviews.author: John Fields

customer_reviews.title: bat is the best out there for the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: bat is the best out there for the cheap price....they give you 3 balls 1 of them has already split in half....when buying this bat order some of the franklin indestruct-a-balls they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Duane C.

product_meta.title: Franklin MLB Pro-Elite Thin Bat Swing Trainer
product_meta.description: Franklin MLB Pro-Elite Thin Bat Swing Trainer...Improve Your Batting Skills!Franklin Sports is a well-known and respected brand worldwide of sporting goods products. Their creative and innovative products are for everyone who enjoys sports ranging from professional athletes to kids who aspire to play their best.Franklin MLB Pro-Elite Thin Bat Swing Trainer features: * Strengthens swing speed and hand-eye coordination * Thin aluminum construction * Durable 30" in length * 1a...>" diameter bat barrel * Includes three 5A1/2" Soft Strike mini balls * To be used with supplied soft balls and plastic golf balls only Improve Your Hitting With This Easy-To-Use Trainer!
feature_bullets: 30" in length, Aluminum construction with 1 1/8" bat barrel
Lightweight design allows for more swings and less fatigue
For use with plastic training balls or Soft Strike Mini Balls (Franklin item No.1074) only
